item.title: We're Going to be Paying for This for the Next 30 Years!
item.description: Go inside a major financial decision. We share the honest story behind a huge loan and the daunting reality of knowing we'll be paying for this for the next 30 years.

media:content.media:title: We're Going to be Paying for This for the Next 30 Years!
media:content.media:description: Go inside a major financial decision. We share the honest story behind a huge loan and the daunting reality of knowing we'll be paying for this for the next 30 years.

item.title: Keeping a Straight Line is HARD!
item.description: Why is keeping a straight line so much harder than it looks? This video documents the challenge of precision driving and the techniques and focus required to get the job done right in the field.

item.title: Gas VS Electric | Homestead Clean Up
item.description: Which equipment is better for homestead cleanup? This video puts Gas vs. Electric tools to the ultimate test, comparing power, efficiency, and cost for a massive yard organization project.

item.title: This Tractor is full of Spider Webs!
item.description: What happens when a tractor sits untouched for years? This video documents the surprising moment we uncovered a machine completely full of spider webs and the long process of cleaning it out.

item.title: A Girl and Her Big Rig!
item.description: Go inside the cab for a day in the life! This video documents the journey of a young female driver, showing the hard work, challenges, and pride of operating a massive big rig.

item.title: Changing Our Tractors Tires!
item.description: This video documents a major transition on the farm, showing the last run of our red combine and the highly anticipated, first run of the new green machine. Go inside the exciting moment that marks a new era for our operation.

item.title: Red Combine In the Beginning, Green Combine At the End
item.description: Red Combine In the Beginning, Green Combine At the End

item.title: Behind The Scenes Of Bean Dust
item.description: What creates that massive cloud during the bean harvest? This behind-the-scenes video explains the reality of bean dust, showing the cleanup challenges and the steps we take to manage the mess.

item.title: A Green Combine?
item.description: A surprising new addition to the fleet!

item.title: Too Much Wind Today!
item.description: What happens when the wind is too strong to work? This video documents the frustrating challenge of a high-wind day, showing the unexpected problems it causes for equipment and operations.

item.title: A Dreaded Moment Has Come!
item.description: This video documents a moment we’ve been dreading for a long time.

item.title: Can You Make Money Buying Farm Land?
item.description: Can you actually make money by investing in farmland? This video breaks down the financial reality, exploring the potential for income from crops and long-term appreciation versus the risks and costs of ownership.

item.title: We are Being "Forced" to Plant!
item.description: We’re under the gun! This video documents the challenging reality of being forced to plant due to uncontrollable factors, detailing the techniques and equipment we use to maximize success in a tough situation.

item.title: Loading Corn 101
item.description: What's the best way to load corn into a trailer? This beginner's guide breaks down the essential techniques, safety tips, and equipment checks you need for a quick and efficient haul every time.

item.title: Plowing A Field For The First Time EVER
item.description: What does it take to plow a field? This video documents the exciting, challenging experience of plowing for the first time, showing the setup, the technique, and the satisfying result of turning the soil.

item.title: Don't Know If I'm Doing This Right!
item.description: We started this job with confidence, but now I don't know if I'm doing this right! This video documents the honest struggles of a challenging project and the troubleshooting required to get the job back on track.

item.title: Teaching You the Ways of the Tractor!
item.description: What if you could learn to drive a tractor like a professional? This guide is the answer, breaking down the essential controls, safety tips, and operational techniques you need to master the machine.

item.title: This Field is Going to be Commercial Corn This Year!
item.description: What's the plan for this field? This video documents a major change in our operation as we switch to planting commercial corn this year, showing the preparation and planting process.

item.title: Finally We Get to the Fun Part!
item.description: What happens after all the hard work? This video documents the moment we finally finish the boring prep and get to the fun part of the project or job.

item.title: Can I Do IT?
item.description: I’m putting my skills and endurance to the ultimate test. This video documents my intense attempt to conquer a major challenge and see if I have what it takes to finish.
